404.text: The website you are looking for cannot be found.

footer.text: A-Wallet - Open source PWA Algorand community wallet

login.new_wallet_help1: Your wallet will be stored in your browser. Wallet password is required to open wallet and see the accounts within the wallet and for signing transactions.
login.new_wallet_help2: We recommend the password to be 12 or more characters long, using lower case letters, uppercase letters, numbers and special characters.

swap.title: Swap assets
swap.has_sk: Only standard accounts with private keys are supported now
swap.swap_asset_from: Select asset from which you want to swap
swap.swap_asset_to: Select asset to which you want to swap
swap.apps_optin: SWAP requires your account to opt in to the applications

gateway.title: Free open source payment gateway without a middleman
gateway.perex: Start accepting algo, USDC, USDT or other assets on your website. By accepting cryptocurrency without a financial middleman you will increase your sales on your website and increase your profit.
gateway.create_order: Create a unique matching symbol, e.g. order id
gateway.customer_pays: Customer pays directly to your algorand account
gateway.customer_redirected: Customer will be redirected back to your website after successful payment
gateway.use_your_money: Use your money. You can exchange USDT and take USD from the exchange, or you can pay with USDT for other goods or services
gateway.you_make_details: You make the payment details. You setup the successful and cancel URL address. We notify you when the payment is done. You have to check in your backend where you accept the payment that it has been received and you notify the customer.
gateway.opensource: This project is open source. You can clone, modify, or run it in your own private environment for commercial purposes
gateway.just_website: The payment gateway is just an HTML website with javascript. No other backend is used other than official algorand nodes.
gateway.no_restrictions: You do not need an AWallet account in order to use the gateway.
gateway.parameters_perex: You can set any of these parameters. The only required fields include the address where you want to receive your payment and the transaction amount. The payment address consists of two parts: payment info, and gateway settings. Both fields are base64 encoded separated by "/". Please make sure that you url-encode them properly. Payment info is the basic algorand protocol address used for example in the QR codes.
gateway.amount: use the asset base unit. E.g. 1 ALGO = 1000000
gateway.fee: the amount in microalgos. E.g. 0.001 ALGO = 1000
gateway.success: URL address to which the client is redirected after successful payment
gateway.cancel: URL address to which the client is redirected after he clicks cancel payment
gateway.asset: You can specify asset id for the transaction
gateway.error_transaction: Please fill in at least account, amount and asset
gateway.error_url: URL address must start with https://

receive.title: Receive payment
receive.decimals: Information about decimal place to QR code
receive.label: Suggested label of the receiver address

acc_overview.title: Account overview
acc_overview.name: Name
acc_overview.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this account from your wallet?
acc_overview.no_assets: There are no assets yet on this account
acc_overview.pay_help: Send money or tokens to other accounts in the network.
acc_overview.swap_help: You can swap one token to another using DEX aggregator services
acc_overview.rekey_help: If you are afraid that your account private key may be compromise, you can rekey your account to new private key and keep your original address safe.
acc_overview.asset_optin_help: If you want to receive asset on algorand network you have to open the account for that token.
acc_overview.receive_payment_help: You can ask your customers or friends to send you money. This page will generate payment QR code so that others can do it on one click.
acc_overview.export_help: You can generate shamir backup mnemonics or algorand mnemonic for accounts with private keys.
acc_overview.arc14_help: ARC 14 is authentication standard utilizing signed transactions. You can generate the authentication tokens on this page.
acc_overview.asset_optinArc200_help: You can watch on your account the ARC200 assets. ARC200 assets are smart contracts with feature that anyone can opt in user's account to be able to receive the asset. ARC200 assets may be dangerous and you should require trustworthy audit of the smart contract so that you can fully trust it.
acc_overview.scheduled_payment_help: You can setup and manage a scheduled periodic payments to another accounts

optin.title: Accept transfers of asset in account
optin.creator: Creator address
optin.optin_confirm: Are you sure you want to pay 0.001 algo to opt in to this asset? After you opt in, you will be able to receive this asset in your account.
optin.asset_opt_in_success: Successfully opted in for the asset

newacc.title: New account
newacc.name: Internal account name
newacc.multisig_help: Multisignature account can process transactions only if N accounts listed at the account creation sign the transaction.
newacc.select_account_from_list: Select existing accounts in your wallet
newacc.add_other_accounts: Add your friends' accounts - one account per line
newacc.trashold_help: Select how many accounts are required to sign the transaction
newacc.create_account_help: In order to create the account, make sure to backup mnemonic phrase. Is it safe to show the phrase now?
newacc.position_question: What is the word at position n.
newacc.mnemonic_help: Write down the mnemonic words in the displayed order, copy or take a picture. Next step will be to confirm some of the words from this phrase and we will save it to the encrypted storage in your browser. It is safe to store this mnemonic and use this address without storing it to the account. Make sure never to lose the mnemonic phrase.
newacc.auto_lock_off: Auto lock feature is turned off
newacc.create_basic_help: Algorand basic account is ED25529 account with private key. This method uses your computer random number generator to create secret for your account.
newacc.ledger_account_help: One of most secure solutions is to handle the secret key generation by specialized device. This account utilizes Ledger device to create your account and handle the signing operations.
newacc.wc_account_help: You can connect to your friend's wallet using the wallet connect account type. You can send them request to sign the message for example as part of multisig.
newacc.twofa_account_help: Two factor account is multisig account, where one account is account of your choosing for example ledger account or email password account, second account is recovery account - ideally account which is not in the same secure storage, and third account is the two factor account from the server which signs transactions when you provide correct two factor pin code.
newacc.email_pass_account_help: ARC76 Email & Password account allows you to generate algorand account from any text. The text is hashed and generates 32 bytes as seed for your algorand account. This may be alternative to other types of random number generators in your computer or hw device which you can utilize in two factor account or generic multisig account.
newacc.create_vanity_help: You can brute force nice account address for your ED25529 account. This method simply tries a lot of combinations of creating account and lets you pick first or last letters of the account address.
newacc.create_multisign_account_help: Multisig accounts are the most secure accounts. If used in combination of multiple ledger devices and different random number generators, this provides enterprise level of security which is hardcoded directly to the algorand blockchain.
newacc.watch_account_help: You can track any account on the network.
newacc.import_account_help: You can recover the account from the algorand recovery mnemonic.
newacc.shamir_account_help: You can recover the account from the shamir backup recovery mnemonics.
newacc.no_accounts_at_network: There are no accounts for selected network

arc76account.title: Email and password account (ARC-0076)
arc76account.description: Hash of combination of your email and your password will generate seed bytes for your first algorand account. You can change the password or email only by rekeying to another account.
arc76account.description2: ARC-0076 standard will be used with algorithm PBKDF2-999999-SHA256. We recommend the password length to be at least 50 characters long. This type of account may be served as secondary type of random number generator and may strengthen your security. Please keep the secret secure and do not reuse it.
arc76account.arc_draft: ARC-0076 is in the DRAFT state. The specification can change. Please consider this implementation for experimental usage.
arc76account.select_password: Please select very very very secure password.
arc76account.password_not_stored: Watch out. We do not store your password. We will store only the account public address and email to the secure storage. When you will be doing transactions with this account you will be prompted to enter the password.
arc76account.gui_not_implemented: GUI for signing transaction without stored password is not currently implemented.

import.title: Import wallet
import.help: You can import previously exported wallets. Wallet password stays within the exported file, so you can access it after the import with the same password as before. You can change the password after login from the settings page.

pay.title: Make payment - from
pay.note_is_b64: Note is Base64 encoded. If enabled you can post base64 input in the note field and send it as raw data to the network.
pay.signature_from_friend: Please enter signature from your friend here
pay.store_other_help: It is better to store the account to which you are sending money in the address book
pay.name: Name
pay.send_to_other_signators: Send this data to other signators
pay.state_sent: Payment sent to the network. Tx:
pay.state_confirmed: Confirmation has been received. Your payment is in the block
pay.state_error_not_sent: Payment has probably not reached the network. Are you offline? Please check you account
pay.pay_to_address_malformed: Pay To address seems to be malformed.
pay.asset_failed_to_load: It seems that desired asset has failed to load
pay.asset_too_small_balance: It seems your balance is below desired pay amount
pay.rekey_warning: Please pay special attention to this transaction. From now on, the account will use a different private key to be able to complete transactions. If you do not have the private key of the new account, you will most likely lose the ability to sign transactions.
pay.select_account_for_payment: Select account from which you want to make the payment

settings.title: Settings
settings.backup_help: You can backup your wallet and import to another computer.

privacy.title: Privacy policy
privacy.q1: What private information about me do you collect?
privacy.a1: None. Besides IP address and browser which is stored in logs for every internet service, we do not collect any form of private information such as your name, email or address.
privacy.q2: What do you store in cookies?
privacy.a2: Nothing. We do not use cookies. We use persistent local storage called IndexedDB for the storage of your wallet.
privacy.q3: How do you collect analytics information?
privacy.a3: We do not. We do not use any form of analytics service, e.g. google analytics, so that you can feel safer. The website is purely HTML with javascript. We do know your IP address only when you make requests to the server. Depending on your settings and your algod server or indexer, the selected server also may know your IP address.
privacy.q4: Does use of this service affect the ads I see?
privacy.a4: No. Ad servers do not have any information from us about any usage. The only way how, e.g. google, may know you are using this service is if you access this site from google search.
privacy.a5: Scholtz & Company, jsa has created this service. Company Id: 51 882 272, VAT ID: SK2120828105, based in Bratislava, Slovakia.  If this is running in the official website a-wallet.net, the company is also the service provider. The company is not liable for any service, nor any errors in the application.

assetcreate.title: New NFT / ASA
assetcreate.creator: Creator address
assetcreate.creator_not_found: Create address or import address first
assetcreate.default_fronzen: Frozen: User accounts will need to be unfrozen before transacting
assetcreate.decimals: Decimals: integer number of decimals for asset unit calculation
assetcreate.totalIssuance: Total number of this asset available for circulation
assetcreate.unitName: Used to display asset units to user
assetcreate.assetURL: Optional URL relating to the asset
assetcreate.assetMetadataHash: Optional hash commitment of some sort relating to the asset. Base64 format
assetcreate.manager: Manager can modify manager, reserve, freeze, and clawback account for the asset.
assetcreate.reserve: Reserve address: Specified address is considered the asset reserve (it has no special privileges, this is only informational)
assetcreate.freeze: Freeze address: Specified address can freeze or unfreeze user asset holdings
assetcreate.clawback: Clawback address: Specified address can revoke user asset holdings and send them to other addresses
assetcreate.note: Note set in the create transaction

new_account_ledger.description: Ledger is a physical device - HW wallet which can store your private key. The maximum security for storing the assets on algorand is multisig account with all signators secured by ledger devices.
new_account_ledger.connect: Connect ledger and load algorand address
new_account_ledger.save_address: Save the address to the wallet

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.a1: Algo wallet was initially created by Scholtz & Company, jsa. Open source, HTML only, corporate friendly, and security are the main advantages for its usage. Algorand logo, the words "algo" and "algorand" are trademarked by Algorand, Inc., and are used with algorand media guidelines https://www.algorand.com/about/media-kit/ .
faq.q2: How is my wallet data secured?
faq.a2: Your data is in the browser only. It is stored in persistent IndexedDB. Every wallet is encrypted using aes256 with your password. If you make a strong enough password, your wallet will never be brute-forced. Your password does not leave your computer and resides only in the browser cache. The cache is destroyed in 5 minutes after login.
faq.q3: Does my wallet password go to the internet?
faq.q4: How can I change my wallet password?
faq.a4_3: Type old password, new password, and confirm new password.
faq.a4_4: Submit form and your password will be changed.
faq.q5: Can I move my wallet to another computer?
faq.a5_3: Go to the backup section and save your data to a local file.
faq.a5_4: In the other computer go to new wallet, import wallet, and upload the downloaded file to the other browser storage.
faq.a5_5: Access the wallet with the same password as before. You can change the password in settings.
faq.q6: Can I view the source code?
faq.a6: Yes. https://github.com/scholtz/wallet/ This wallet was made open source and is free to be used, copied or modified for any reason, including for commercial purposes. If you are able to participate in the project, please be so kind and create a pull request with your improvement.
faq.q7: How can I help the project?
faq.a7_1: Donatation to algorand address AWALLETCPHQPJGCZ6AHLIFPHWBHUEHQ7VBYJVVGQRRY4MEIGWUBKCQYP4Y will help the project keep going. The project has not been funded from Algorand Inc. nor the Algorand Foundation.
faq.a7_2: To translate the project or help with the translation, please go to  https://github.com/scholtz/wallet/tree/master/src/locales, copy the translation file to your language and make a pull request.
faq.a7_3: If you are a programmer, please do a code review, or help us in any way you think this project should be better.
faq.q8: How can I create a multisignature account?
faq.a8_1: First create an account with private keys or create a public account. It is better to give them names that will help you will remember their purpose.
faq.a8_2: Go to create a new address and select multisignature address.
faq.a8_3: Select all accounts that can sign the transactions and select how many signatures that adhere to the minimum for the network to accept the multisig payment.
faq.a8_4: After you create the multisignature account, you can access it from the accounts list page.

new_account_wc.title: Add WalletConnect account
new_account_wc.save_address: Save the address to the wallet

new_account_2fa.title: 2FA Account
new_account_2fa.help1: 2FA account allows you to create multisig account with 3 accounts setup with threshold of 2 required for signature.
new_account_2fa.help2: First account may be password protected account where in the case of the hack of your wallet the hacker cannot sign the transactions on your behalf. If your 2FA device gets broken, or 2FA service gets down, you can rekey your account to another 2FA multisig with your first and second account.
new_account_2fa.help3: 2FA service is third party service which might be compromised. If hacker receives your private key and receives the private key of the 2fa service, he may sign transactions on your behalf. By using the 2fa service you increase chance that hacker who receive ability to sign transactions with your primary or recovery account is not able to sign transactions from your multisig account.
new_account_2fa.scan_qr: Please scan the QR code with your 2FA app
new_account_2fa.confirm_help: Please write 2FA code from your auth app to confirm the setup. After confirmation it is not possible to request the 2fa secret code again.

onlineofflinedialog.header: Protect the network with your account's balance
onlineofflinedialog.warning: You can select public participation node in order to verify the blocks in the network. You will generate new participation keys at the public algod server and sign the transaction to allow these participation keys collect blocks data. This will cost you as one transaction on the network (0.001 algo). Online account state does not mean that your private key is exposed to the internet. It means that your account is registered at the online algod node which is protecting blockchain.

new_account_shamir.help: Shamir backup is the method to split mnemonic into N parts where M accounts is the recovery threshold.

account_export.help: On this page you can export your private key in form of algorand's mnemonic or shamir backup.
account_export.shamir_help: Please secure mnemonic at very secure place. Make sure you write down all parts of shamir backup and do not store the recovery threshold at one place.
account_export.algo_help: Please secure mnemonic at very secure place.

arc200.name: Name
arc200.create_box: Create box for this asset for this account

scheduled_payments.title: Scheduled payments management
scheduled_payments.description: With decentralized scheduler you will deploy the smart contract - escrow account which will be used for purpose to allow any executor perform withdrawal from your escrow account to the destination account when the time comes. Executors are incentivized to execute your scheduled task with vision of receiving small fee paid in ASA.Gold token - 0.001 gram of gold.
scheduled_payments.no_payment_found: No scheduled payments has been found
scheduled_payments.description_detail: In this detail overview of the scheduled payment you can see the current asset balance of the escrow account and you have actions to deposit more assets to the escrow account or to executors.
scheduled_payments.deposit_fee_title: Deposit asa.gold token to fee pool smart contract
scheduled_payments.list_of_assets: List of assets at escrow account
scheduled_payments.xgov_promo: This work has been performed with support from the Algorand Foundation xGov Grants Program
